Description: For sale is my Ernie Ball Music Man Stingray guitar. It is in excellent condition. There is some VERY light pick scratching on the upper part of the pick guard which isn't visible in photos and a very small blemish on the lower part of the pick guard. It is barely visible in the light reflection in the 3rd picture. It is all stock. The vintage Music Man pickups sound great and offer a variety of tones. The Stainless Steel frets are smooth as glass. It has been cleaned and polished. The neck and fret board have been thoroughly cleaned and the guitar has brand new Ernie Ball Paradigm Slinky strings (10-46) installed. OHSC included. Thanks for looking! Specs: Size 14-1/16" wide, 1-5/8" thick, 39-1/4" long (35.7 cm wide, 4.1 cm thick, 99.7 cm long Body Wood African mahogany Body Finish High gloss polyester Body Color Vintage Tobacco Bridge Music Man® Modern tremolo with vintage bent steel saddles Pickguard Shell Scale Length 25-1/2" (64.8 cm) Neck Radius 10" (25.4 cm) Headstock Size 6-3/8" (16.2 cm) long Frets 22 - High profile, medium width, Stainless Steel Neck Width 1-5/8" (41.3 mm) at nut, 2-1/4" (56.9 mm) at last fret Neck Wood Select maple neck Fingerboard Rosewood Fret Markers 1/4" White Face dots Neck Finish Ultra-light satin polyurethane finish Neck Colors Natural aged yellow finish Tuning Machines Schaller M6-IND locking Truss Rod Adjustable - no component or string removal Neck Attachment 5 bolts - perfect alignment with no shifting; Sculpted neck joint allows smooth access to higher frets Electronic Shielding Chrome plated aluminum control cover Controls 500kohm volume and tone - .022µF tone capacitor Switching 3-way toggle pickup selector Pickups HH - 2 Music Man® custom wound humbucking with chrome covers
Title: Ernie Ball Music Man USA StingRay HH Trem Guitar Vintage Tobacco Burst + OHSC
